name: Add model name with date

selectedProject.title: ppe_bbox_multiclass
selectedProject.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <RectangleLabels name="label" toName="image">
    
    
  <Label value="torso" background="#FFA39E"/><Label value="head" background="#D4380D"/><Label value="person" background="#FFC069"/><Label value="safety vest" background="#AD8B00"/><Label value="hard hat" background="#D3F261"/></RectangleLabels>
</View>

lsProjects.title: ppe_bbox_multiclass
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <RectangleLabels name="label" toName="image">
    
    
  <Label value="torso" background="#FFA39E"/><Label value="head" background="#D4380D"/><Label value="person" background="#FFC069"/><Label value="safety vest" background="#AD8B00"/><Label value="hard hat" background="#D3F261"/></RectangleLabels>
</View>

lsProjects.title: pictor_ppe_seg
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image" zoom="true"/>
  <BrushLabels name="tag" toName="image">
    
    
  <Label value="safety vest" background="#ff0000"/><Label value="hard hat" background="#0dd33f"/><Label value="person" background="#00bfff"/></BrushLabels>
</View>

lsProjects.title: ppe_bbox_clean
lsProjects.description: Bounding Boxes for YOLO person regions model for PPE detection
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <RectangleLabels name="label" toName="image">
    
    
  <Label value="torso" background="#a5ff9e"/><Label value="head" background="#0d25d3"/><Label value="person" background="#FFC069"/><Label value="hard hat" background="#fd3f3f"/><Label value="safety vest" background="#d30dcc"/></RectangleLabels>
</View>

lsProjects.title: hard_hat_classification
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <Choices name="choice" toName="image">
    
    
    
  <Choice value="Hard Hat"/><Choice value="NO Hard Hat"/></Choices>
</View>

lsProjects.title: safety_vest_classification
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <Choices name="choice" toName="image">
    
    
    
  <Choice value="Safety Vest"/><Choice value="No Safety Vest"/></Choices>
</View>

lsProjects.title: Westlake-Demo
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <RectangleLabels name="label" toName="image">
    <Label value="CARDBOARD" background="#FFA39E"/>
    <Label value="CONTAINER" background="#A39EFF"/>
    <Label value="FILM" background="#D4380D"/>
    <Label value="FOAM" background="#FFC069"/>
    <Label value="PERSON" background="#D3F261"/>
  	<Label value="PAPER" background="#9effef"/>
  </RectangleLabels>
</View>

lsProjects.title: ppe
lsProjects.label_config:
<View>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <RectangleLabels name="label" toName="image">
    <Label value="worker" background="#F37121"/>
    <Label value="worker_vest" background="#EF5179"/>
    <Label value="worker_hardhat" background="#515DDE"/>
    <Label value="worker_vest_hardhat" background="#C0E218"/>
  </RectangleLabels>
</View><!-- C0E218, 111D5E, C70039, F37121  -->

userArguments.name: labels
userArguments.value: torso, head, person, safety vest, hard hat

pipelines.name: Build YOLOv7 App

pipelines.name: Patch device
pipelines.description: A Kubeflow pipeline running Ansible playbook from a git repo on a subset of devices

pipelines.name: Prepare Labelstudio Data for YOLOv7 Model Training
pipelines.description: A pipeline to prepare LabelStudio data for YOLOv7 model training

default_version.name: Prepare Labelstudio Data for YOLOv7 Model Training - c65754

pipelines.name: Train YOLOv7 with Labelstudio and 1 T4 GPU
pipelines.description: A pipeline to train YOLOv7 on a custom data set from Teknoir Labelstudio. Transfer learn from "transfer_weights."

default_version.name: Train YOLOv7 with Labelstudio and 1 T4 GPU - 1fd10f
